Package timer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PlayerAnimationTimer
    The purpose of this counter is to reset the player's animation back to idle once it plays through once.
    PlayerDashTimer
    This implements the timer initiated when the player uses their dash ability to determine when to stop the dash.
    PlayerHitboxTimer
    This is a steplistener that counts when the hitbox from the melee attack should be removed.
    PlayerManaRegenTimer
    A StepListener that regenerates mana of the player, as long as it's not at maximum.
